package.name: cadence_pinterest
package.summary: This extension allows you to quickly implement Pinterest conversion tracking and code on your Magento store. Supports Visit and Checkout conversion events.
package.description:
This Pinterest Tag extension allows you to quickly implement visitor, add-to-cart, and checkout events through the Pinterest Conversion Pixel. Learn how it works..

After setting your Pinterested TID (Tag Id), you may:

  • Track Visit (code is displayed on every page)
  • Track Checkouts (code is displayed only upon successful checkout)
  • Track AddToCart

The extension works by attaching the relevant pixel code (for either Visits or Conversions) to your store's webpage, just after the start of the body tag. If you have the correct pixel id installed, Pinterest will do the rest.

Click here to view our Pinterest Tracking Pixel Install Guide.

Multistore; Tracks Grand Total and Quantity

This extension supports installations with multiple websites and/or stores. The Checkout Pixel will track the grand total and the quantity ordered.

About The Developer

Cadence Labs is a digital design, software development, and Magento agency based in Boulder, Colorado. Our developers are Magento certified eCommerce geeks!
package.notes: Added support for new Pinterest Tag javascript implementation, events supported: addToCart, checkout
